ComicInfo.Title: Darkest Before Dawn
ComicInfo.Summary: Darkest Before Dawn: With the vampires taking control of Earth and many of the world's heroes turned into vampires, a small band of resistance is led by Director Bones, but they are soon all wiped out. A sole survivor from Bones' group joins up with the main resistance group located in Kandor, but the group has differing opinions on what their strategy against the vampires should be.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 22:35:32. [CVDB934929] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:00. [Issue ID 2416716]
